session.objective: Research Claude Code Agent Teams feature and incorporate into project memory systems

completeSessionLog.outcomes: Research complete, analysis and memories created

commitChanges.note: Research session on main - no commits made

workLog.task: Fetch Claude Code Agent Teams documentation

workLog.findings: Found related memories: ADR-009 parallel-safe design, ai-agents overview, multi-agent coordination patterns
Created claude-code-agent-teams memory with project applicability
Created 8 memories (IDs 475-482) covering architecture, use cases, hooks, task management, plan approval, failure modes, limitations
Linked to ADR-009, ADR review process, existing orchestration patterns

deliverables.name: Claude Code Agent Teams Analysis
deliverables.description: Comprehensive 4000+ word analysis with applicability assessment

deliverables.name: Forgetful Memories (8)
deliverables.description: Atomic memories: architecture, decision criteria, use cases, hooks, task management, plan approval, failure modes, limitations

decisions.decision: Agent teams complement rather than replace current subagent system
decisions.rationale: Subagents work well for focused tasks. Agent teams add value when teammates need direct discussion/challenge.

decisions.decision: Monitor experimental feature for stability before adoption
decisions.rationale: Current limitations (no session resumption, one team per session) may impact production use.
